in a 35-32 win at Detroit, Michael Vick made the most of his first pro start since 2006. He completed 21-of-34 passes for 284 yards and two touchdowns and rushed for 37 yards on seven carries. I'm here to announce that Michael Vick will be the starting quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles. I think his performance has exceeded expectations the past several weeks, said Eagles head coach Andy Reid at an evening press conference.`` This is not about the health or the performance of Kevin Kolb ... this is more about Michael Vick and his accelerated play.''
